snippet: The new recommendations from the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention came as thousands of foreign students and workers, and Americans who have been traveling abroad, began arriving on campuses to start a new school year.
abstract: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention advises American colleges and universities, and any students or staff arriving from nations hit by Ebola virus, to take extended precautions against spreading disease; maximum incubation period for virus before symptoms appear is 21 days.
lead_paragraph: The new recommendations from the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention came as thousands of foreign students and workers, and Americans who have been traveling abroad, began arriving on campuses to start a new school year.
